android.support.v4.graphics

Class BitmapCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.graphics.BitmapCompat

  • public class BitmapCompat
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for accessing features in android.graphics.Bitmap introduced after API level 4 in a backwards compatible fashion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BitmapCompat() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getAllocationByteCount(Bitmap bitmap)
      Returns the size of the allocated memory used to store this bitmap's pixels in a backwards compatible way.

      • getAllocationByteCount

        public static int getAllocationByteCount(Bitmap bitmap)
        Returns the size of the allocated memory used to store this bitmap's pixels in a backwards compatible way.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap in which to return it's allocation size
        Returns:
        the allocation size in bytes
